siteMetadata.blurb: Frontend Engineer @ Qantas. Tinkerer of things. Tea lover. Passionate about react graphql and making things fast.

markdownRemark.html:
I was writing ld-vue when I needed a way to pass arguments to my Vue mixin. In my case, I needed to pass a client id to an external library so it can be initialised.

This is the technique I ended up using to pass params to my mixin:

const exampleMixin = clientId => ({
  methods: {
    initSdk: function() {
      this.flags = await initLDClient(clientSideId, );
    },
  },
})

export default exampleMixin
